title: Twisted Fate's E (Stacked Deck) missing sounds/laugh (Gameplay Bug)
body:
This bug has been found after I have updated to the most recent patch (6.3). As listed in the title, TF's E has no more laugh when the 4 attacks passive occur.
Clearly it's a missing sounds bug that need to be fixed soon.
Thank you :)

replies.body: So what happened with the listed bug? I updated my league to patch 6.4 and the bug is still here {{item:3070}}

Looking forward to hear back from you :) This bug really needs to be fixed asap because the sound of his full stacked deck is essential to me while doing a full combo. 
Thanks you in advance !

Hey MicroVolt! 

Judging by your icon, you may play a lot of TF. Good catch on the missing VO. I'll pass this along to champion so they can see what's going on here!
can we also get some context on how you guys changed his stacking indicator from being a buff above the health bar to his actual e ability
